item.title: Will genetic tests help you choose a diet and sport
item.description: The first thing a person who decides to undergo genetic testing faces is the variety of offers from different companies. They can be divided into two large groups: diagnostic and screening. 1. Diagnostic tests are prescribed by a doctor when it is necessary to establish an accurate diagnosis. Usually, such a study is required if the external manifestations of the disease do not fit into the textbook clinical picture of a particular hereditary syndrome.
